org.apache.distributedlog.namespace

Class NamespaceWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.namespace.NamespaceWatcher

  • public abstract class NamespaceWatcher
extends Object
    Namespace Watcher watching namespace changes.

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(NamespaceListener listener)
        Register listener for namespace changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to add

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(NamespaceListener listener)
        Unregister listener from the namespace watcher.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to remove from namespace watcher

      • watchNamespaceChanges

        protected abstract void watchNamespaceChanges()
        Watch the namespace changes. It would be triggered each time a namspace listener is added. The implementation should handle this.
